name: PHASEPushStreamNode
desc: An audio stream you manage to provide a sound buffer data.

items.name: var format: AVAudioFormat
items.desc: The format of the audio stream data.

items.name: func scheduleBuffer(buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer, time: AVAudioTime?, options: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions)
items.desc: Schedules audio data playback at a specific time.

items.name: func scheduleBuffer(buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer, time: AVAudioTime?, options: PHASEPushStreamBufferOptions, completionCallbackType: PHASEPushStreamCompletionCallbackCondition, completionHandler: (PHASEPushStreamCompletionCallbackCondition) -> Void)
items.desc: Schedules audio data playback at a specific time with a completion handler.

items.name: func scheduleBuffer(buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer, completionCallbackType: PHASEPushStreamCompletionCallbackCondition, completionHandler: (PHASEPushStreamCompletionCallbackCondition) -> Void)
items.desc: Schedules audio data playback with a completion handler.

items.name: enum PHASEPushStreamCompletionCallbackCondition
items.desc: A status that describes the results after the app schedules a push-stream buffer.

items.name: var gainMetaParameter: PHASENumberMetaParameter?
items.desc: A meta parameter for dynamic loudness control.

items.name: var rateMetaParameter: PHASENumberMetaParameter?
items.desc: A meta parameter for dynamic rate control.
